version_description:
Improved loading system main menu;
Bug that prevent the game open were fixed.

Hotfix for blue screen at opening the game;

Like our Facebook page, and follow the news.

Some bugs in the multiplayer have been fixed.
Now it's possible to set up house and bases in the multiplayer.
Claymore now spawns the map.
Attachments for weapons have been added.
Improvement in Artificial Intelligence of Zombies:
Fixed chest bug;
Fixed item duplication bug;
Fixed a backpack bug that remove attachments from weapons;
Possibility to select region in multi player;
Improvement in the attachment laser beam;
"Disconnect" button has been fixed (character does not die when button is pressed);
Fixed bug that made some zombies invisible in multi player;
Fixed grenade in multi player;
The attachment system has been improved.
Added a female zombie;
Added backpack system and limited inventory;
- Now you will need to look for backpacks to carry more items.
Added in Craft the possibility of creating small backpack;

Fixed dupe items in multiplayer;
Fixed bug with chest;
Fixed bug that prevented sound from shooting in multiplayer;
Fixed bug with infection system.
Fixed bug in which car spawn with smoke;
Added Katana;
Zombies now have possibility to drop backpacks;
Improvements in multiplayer mode;

New Weapons:
- Mauser 98 (Rifle)
- Remington (Rifle)
- Desert Eagle
- New Shotgun
- Shawn Off Shotgun
- Revolver #1 (Like Rick's of TWD)
- Revolver #2
- New SMG

Claymore was nerfed! :)

Improvements in many multiplayer errors, and network optimization.
2 new regions were added in the multiplayer:
- South Korea
- India

Possibility to change distance view of the character and change the quality of the game.

Some bugs with backpacks have been fixed.

Fixed some bugs with zombies in multiplayer;
Fixed duplication of items with the chest and backpack full;
Fixed ad that was in front of the hot bar;
Fixed Katana spawn in multiplayer;
Added Voice Chat (test) in multiplayer;
Added 2 more languages in the game:
- Russian;
- Chinese.

Fixed dupe items with hotbar;
Fixed dupe items with chest;
Fixed problem with ads;
Added fall damage;
Added new and bigger map of WithstandZ (Capital).

In this update we implemented a new artificial intelligence system for the zombies. In this system we focus on the optimization and performance of the game, including on multiplayer mode.

* Fixed a bug that caused the loading screen to blink while playing.
* All maps have been optimized to improve game performance;
* Fixed a bug that allowed attacking any player in PvE mode;
* Fixed item spawn in multiplayer mode;
* Fixed a bug that prevented the zombies from walking in the multiplayer.

Added a new deathmatch map with 15 player capacity;
Some bugs have been fixed;
Added time of 3 seconds before respawn;
Fixed bug with stairs;
Fixed an issue that made ads appear during the game;
Added two new server regions: Russia & Russia, East.
Send us suggestions for the next updates!

* Fixed bug that prevented playing the multiplayer mode.
* Added an option to adjust camera sensitivity in "Options".

We are restructuring all ads in the game to get back to developing WithstandZ!
We will be updating all game systems, rebuilding and focusing on Multiplayer.
News are on the way, wait!

In this update we implemented a new artificial intelligence system for the zombies. In this system we focus on the optimization and performance of the game, including on multiplayer mode.

* Fixed a bug that caused the loading screen to blink while playing.
* All maps have been optimized to improve game performance;
* Fixed a bug that allowed attacking any player in PvE mode;
* Fixed item spawn in multiplayer mode;
* Fixed a bug that prevented the zombies from walking in the multiplayer.

* Fixed problem that ad was over the items bar.
* Fixed problem with zombies spawn.
+ Added a new "Craft Coins" tab in the inventory, where it might be possible to create items using coins that could soon be earned by killing zombies or watching an ad.

* Fixed zombies that did not die in multiplayer mode;
* Fixed zombie physics (we'll make more changes);
* The item drop of zombies has been improved;
* The synchronization of players' movement in multiplayer mode has been improved;
* In this update we focused on the performance of the game, so we made great optimizations that will improve the speed of the game. We are working hard to further improve WithstandZ so we can add new features and items.

Added option to protect servers by password.
Fixed issue with connection stability.
CraftCoin's system has been improved.

* Fixed some performance issues.
* Fixed weapon force on enemies (now they will be pushed backwards).
* FIXED: Destroying buildings generates a dead player.
* Axe now does less damage to zombies and more damage to trees.
+ Added new character creation system.
+ Added possibility to customize character.
+ Characters will now be born with 1 Pistol, 1 Axe and 2 Bandages.

[Info] New clothes will be added soon. Optimizations and further improvements.

* We have recreated the entire game saving system. Now it's faster and more optimized!
* Fixed bug that prevented player from being respawn.
* It is now possible to change the language in the game options.
* We are preparing the game to work with controllers (joysticks).
* Fixed bug in the multiplayer that made the player lose his world saved.
* Fixed an ad that was stuck in front of the item bar.
* Optimizations in game performance.
* Improved security.
